title: Why You Need Middleware
description: This is a quick post about why middleware is essential

body.raw: Middleware is really cool and here's why. It's a way to add functionality to your application without having to change the core code. It's like a plugin system for your app. You can use middleware to add logging, authentication, and more. In this post, we'll explore how middleware works in Node.js and Next.js.
